General configuration options

  • apply_reg_limits:
    If true, input profiles outside the limits specified in the coefficient files are reset to the min/max. If false, such profiles will generate warning messages unless verbose is false (default = false). Has no effect if do_checkinput is false.

  • verbose:
    If false, only messages for fatal errors are output (default = true)

  • do_checkinput:
    If true, checks whether input profiles are within both absolute and regression limits. If false, no check is performed (default = true)

  • fix_hgpl:
    If true, apply fix to match 2m p with elevation in geometry calculations (default = true)

General radiative transfer options

  • switchrad:
    Determines input perturbation for AD/K routines: if true, radiancedata_ad/k % bt is used for channels with wavelengths > 3 micrometers, otherwise radiancedata_ad/k modulo total is used (default = true)

  • addrefrac:
    If true, RTTOV calculations account for atmospheric refraction (default = true)

  • use_t2m_opdep:
    If true, activate use of surface temperature in optical depth calculation (default = true)

  • use_q2m:
    If true, activate use of surface humidity (default = true)

  • do_lambertian:
    If true, activate treatment of surface as Lambertian instead of specular reflector for downwelling emitted radiance (default = false)

  • lambertian_fixed_angle:
    switches between the fixed angle (true, default) and parameterised angle (false) for the downwelling transmittances in the Lambertian surface option (only applicable if do_lambertian is true)

  • plane_parallel:
    If true, ignore atmospheric curvature (default = false)

  • rad_down_lin_tau:
    if true (default), uses linear in tau for downwelling radiance calculation in rttov_integrate; if false uses the simpler layer-average (the impact on radiances is very small)

  • ozone_data:
    If true, user is supplying ozone profile (default = false)

  • co2_data:
    If true, user is supplying co2 profile (default = false)

  • n2o_data:
    If true, user is supplying n2o profile (default = false)

  • co_data:
    If true, user is supplying co profile (default = false)

  • ch4_data:
    If true, user is supplying ch4 profile (default = false)

  • so2_data:
    If true, user is supplying so2 profile (default = false)

Visible/IR-only radiative transfer options

  • solar_sea_brdf_model:
    Solar sea BRDF model (JONSWAP or Elfouhaily, default = Elfouhaily))

  • ir_sea_emis_model:
    IR sea emissivity model ( ISEM or IREMIS, default = IREMIS)

  • addsolar:
    If true, enable solar calculations for solar-affected channels (default = false)

  • rayleigh_max_wavelength:
    Ignore Rayleigh scattering for channels at wavelengths above this (microns) (default = 2 microns)

  • rayleigh_min_pressure:
    Ignore Rayleigh scattering at pressures below this (hPa) (default = 0 hPa)

  • rayleigh_single_scatt:
    If true, enable Rayleigh single-scattering for VIS/NIR channels (default = true)

  • do_nlte_correction:
    If true, includes non-LTE bias correction for hi-res sounders (default = false) NB this is independent of addsolar

  • addaerosl:
    If true, account for scattering due to aerosols (default = false)

  • addclouds:
    If true, account for scattering due to clouds (default = false)

  • cldcol_threshold:
    Threshold for stream weights to compute for cloud scattering calculations (default = -1); recommended to be set negative when calling TL, AD or K models. Only applies when addclouds is true.

  • ir_scatt_model:
    IR scattering model to use

  • vis_scatt_model:
    VIS/NIR scattering model to use

  • dom_nstreams:
    Number of DOM streams, must be even and not less than 2

  • dom_accuracy:
    Convergence criterion for termination of DOM azimuthal loop

  • dom_opdep_threshold:
    DOM ignores levels below this optical depth: 10. is reasonable, not applied if <= 0

  • grid_box_avg_cloud:
    if true, cloud concentrations for VIS/IR simulations are supplied as model grid-box averages so that they are divided by the cloud fraction inside RTTOV to get the cloud concentration of the cloudy fraction of each layer (default false)

  • rayleigh_single_scatt:
    if false this disables the Rayleigh single scattering calculation for visible channels (default true, only applicable if addsolar is true)

Principal Components-only radiative transfer options

  • addpc:
    If true, carry out Principal Components calculations (default = false).

  • ipcbnd:
    The index of the PC spectral band: 1-3 for IASI clear-sky simulations; 1 otherwise (default = -1).

  • ipcreg:
    The index of the required set of PC predictors: 1-4 for IASI (see table 12 for the number of predictors), and 1-3 for AIRS (for 200, 300 and 400 predictors) (default = -1)

  • addradrec:
    If true, the PC calculations will return reconstructed radiances as well as the PC scores (default = false)

  • npcscores:
    Number of PC scores for PC-RTTOV

MW-only radiative transfer options

  • fastem_version:
    Version of the FASTEM model to use (default = 6).

  • supply_foam_fraction:
    If true, user is sypplying the foam_fraction (see surface window) (default = false).

  • clw_data:
    If true, user is supplying clw profiles (default = false)(not implemented).

Options related to interpolation and the vertical grid

  • addinterp:
    If true, input profiles may be supplied on user-defined levels, and internal interpolation is used (default = false).

  • spacetop:
    If true, treat user's model top as space boundary (default = true)

  • lgradp:
    Allow TL/AD of user pressure levels if addinterp is true (default = false)

  • reg_limit_extrap:
    if is set to true the profiles used for the optical depth calculations are reset to the limit values if some input values fall outside the regression limits (default = false)
